channel.title: How to swap from normal to ancients magic via the dark mage
channel.description:
Well i want to be able to go from normal spell book to the ancient spell book by talking to the dark mage and selecting something that changes it.
Any help will be apreciated if this is in wrong forum say so n i will move it.
~~udluv2~~

item.title: How to swap from normal to ancients magic via the dark mage
item.dc:creator: @udluv2 udluv2
item.description:
@udluv2 wrote:

well i want to make it if u want to use ancients u talk to the dark mage near the bank and to switch back talk to him again. Or a alter like in runescape. If u use the dark mage one it works same as alter in runescape or if u know how to get an actual alter that will be better

Read full topic
